title: Joe Kittinger: An Unsung Hero
description: Joe Kittinger is a man of extraordinary courage who made important contributions to the field of space exploration. Students will learn about Kittinger's work with high-altitude balloons and incredible acts of bravery that benefited both pilots and astronauts. Photographs support the text.
meta: accelerated, aeronautics, altitude, cosmonaut, elongated, gondola, hostile, invaluable, near-fatal, obsessed, solitary confinement, stratosphere
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Sequence Events : Sequence events of a person's life
Compound Adjectives : Understand and use hyphenated compound adjectives
Numbers within Text : Fluently read numbers within the text

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
